summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of redesigned Nexodify AVA landing page with dark premium theme and EU-first positioning. All required features are present and functional including dark theme, navbar, hero section, product proof montage, feature grid, how it works, example findings, sample report preview, security section, FAQ, and footer. Navigation and mobile responsiveness work correctly.

backend_issues.notes: No backend testing performed as this is frontend-only testing. Backend APIs not tested per request requirements.

design_issues.notes: Hot reload WebSocket connection failing but doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Landing page loads with dark theme (#070A12 background)
Navbar is dark, sticky, with blur effect and proper branding
Hero section displays 'EU Label Compliance, Preflighted.' headline
Product proof montage shows dashboard mock with issue cards and PDF preview
All 4 feature cards display correctly: EU 1169/2011 Checks, Label-TDS Cross-Check, Evidence+Sources, Premium PDF
How it works section shows all 3 steps: Upload Documents, Automated Analysis, Review & Export
Example findings cards show severity badges (High, Medium) and recommended fixes
Sample PDF report preview section displays with download button
Security & audit trail section with all 3 info cards: Encrypted Storage, Audit Logging, Data Retention
FAQ section with 5 expandable questions - expansion functionality works
Final CTA section with 'Run a Preflight' button linking to /register
Footer is clean with Privacy, Terms, Support links
Navigation works correctly: Sign In -> /login, Run a Preflight -> /register
Mobile responsive design works (390x844) - stacked layout, readable text
Tablet responsive design works (768x1024) - proper card arrangement
Desktop responsive design works (1920x1080) - full layout
No FDA references found anywhere on the page
No fake trust claims like '98% accuracy' or '500+ brands' found
EU 1169/2011 regulation properly mentioned in hero section
All interactive elements are clickable and functional
Color scheme follows dark premium theme with proper contrast

success_percentage.backend: N/A - Frontend only testing as requested
